languages.text: "У твоих собратьев были весомые причины для атаки мира. Не вижу проблем пожертвовать плебсами ради благого дела".

traits.locale_text: "У твоих собратьев были весомые причины для атаки мира. Не вижу проблем пожертвовать плебсами ради благого дела".

languages.text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
languages.original_text: "У твоих собратьев были весомые причины для атаки мира. Не вижу проблем пожертвовать плебсами ради благого дела".

traits.locale_text: "Your kin had a solid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
"Your kin had a solid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
"Your kin had a solid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
"Your kin had a solid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
"Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."
"Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

languages.text: «Los vuestros tenían una buena razón para atacar este planeta. No veo problema en sacrificar a la plebe si es por una buena causa».
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: «Los vuestros tenían una buena razón para atacar este planeta. No veo problema en sacrificar a la plebe si es por una buena causa».

languages.text: “你的族人有充分的理由攻击这个世界。我认为，只要能为善举做出贡献，牺牲那些低贱的人并没什么问题。”
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: “你的族人有充分的理由攻击这个世界。我认为，只要能为善举做出贡献，牺牲那些低贱的人并没什么问题。”

languages.text: « Les Aeldaris avaient une raison valide d'attaquer ce monde. Je ne vois aucun inconvénient à sacrifier la populace si c'est pour une bonne cause. »
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: « Les Aeldaris avaient une bonne raison d'attaquer ce monde. Je ne vois aucun inconvénient à sacrifier la populace si c'est pour une bonne cause. »

languages.text: 「お前の血族にはこの世界を攻撃する正当な理由があった。大義のためなら、ロウボーンを犠牲にすることに何の問題もないというわけだ」
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の血族にはこの世界を攻撃する正当な理由があった。大義のためなら、ロウボーンを犠牲にすることに何の問題もないというわけだ」

languages.text: "Eure Verwandten hatten einen guten Grund, diese Welt anzugreifen. Ich sehe kein Problem darin, die Niedergeborenen zu opfern, wenn es einer guten Sache hilft."
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Verwandten hatten einen guten Grund, diese Welt anzugreifen. Ich sehe kein Problem darin, die Niedergeborenen zu opfern, wenn es einer guten Sache hilft."

languages.text: "Soydaşlarının bu dünyaya saldırmak için haklı bir sebebi vardı. İyi bir amaca yardımcı olacaksa alt tabakalıları feda etmekte sakınca görmüyorum."
languages.original_text: "Your kin had a valid reason to attack this world. I see no issue with sacrificing the lowborn if it helps a good cause."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarının bu dünyaya saldırmak için haklı bir sebebi vardı. İyi bir amaca yardımcı olacaksa alt tabakalıları feda etmekte sakınca görmüyorum."
